title: sahaja niSTaiyilE
sahitya:
sahaja niSTaiyilE sukhamAi iruppAi shaka vikAraminri sAKSi jIvanE


anupallavi

  ahamAyaiyinri ArAindu pArttE aham brahmam ennum anubhavAnandamAm


caraNam    iru vikArap-puyal Etri mOdiDinum himayamalai pOla idaya shAntiyilE
oru vikAraminri urudiyAi iruppAi onrum kuraiyillai ninrapaDi ninrAl
